b'Prayer is just talking to God. He wants to hear the details. He wants to be involved in your life. Nothing\xe2\x80\x99s too small. Find encouragement in this message from @JonathanOsteen. Check out, "The Love of the Father\xe2\x80\x9d: https://t.co/eeXK2KQPk8 https://t.co/Pf2EHRxozD'

b'The enemy wouldn\xe2\x80\x99t be fighting you so hard unless he knew you were close to your victory. Do your part and get your fire back. Start taking hold of God\xe2\x80\x99s strength. Don\xe2\x80\x99t allow that weariness in.'
b'The Scripture says the things we see are only temporary, but what we hear, what God speaks to us, that\xe2\x80\x99s permanent.'

b'If you\xe2\x80\x99re not giving anything away, nothing new is going to come. Whether or not you keep the blessing depends on what you do with the blessing. When you\xe2\x80\x99re always lifting people, encouraging them, making them better, then blessings are always going to come to you.'

b'God\xe2\x80\x99s not distant. He\xe2\x80\x99s not unapproachable. He\xe2\x80\x99s not mad at us. He\xe2\x80\x99s madly in love with us. Watch this powerful message from @JonathanOsteen out now on Podcast. "The Love of the Father" https://t.co/spV2a4HmrT https://t.co/a0gOnG6aK4'

b'People can\xe2\x80\x99t stop you; bad breaks can\xe2\x80\x99t stop you; injustice can\xe2\x80\x99t stop you. The commanded blessing on your life will override any force that\xe2\x80\x99s trying to hold you back.'
b'Sometimes we don\xe2\x80\x99t realize who we are. You may feel average and ordinary, but because of your Maker, there\xe2\x80\x99s something about you that makes you extremely valuable.'
b'When you see what God is up to, you\xe2\x80\x99ll say it was worth the wait. He\xe2\x80\x99s a God who exceeds expectations.'
b'Start making good decisions. Start honoring God, living with excellence and integrity. When you do this, mistakes of the past don\xe2\x80\x99t have to stop your destiny.'

b'It\xe2\x80\x99s very powerful when you can say, \xe2\x80\x9cGod, I trust not only Your ways, but I trust Your timing.\xe2\x80\x9d Check out "It\'s Worth the Wait" on Podcast here! https://t.co/spV2a4HmrT https://t.co/fF55hURCVp'

b'Sometimes we\xe2\x80\x99re putting pressure on people to keep us fixed, keep us encouraged, keep us complimented. Let them off the hook. They\xe2\x80\x99re not your savior. You have a Savior. He\xe2\x80\x99s on the throne. Go to Him and not to people.'

b'Don\xe2\x80\x99t have a weak mentality; have a warrior mentality. You have to be more determined than the opposition. If you give up every time things don\xe2\x80\x99t go your way, you don\xe2\x80\x99t want it bad enough.'

b'You may not like it, but you can\xe2\x80\x99t bypass the process. You can\xe2\x80\x99t skip the waiting room and reach the fullness of your destiny. Don\'t miss "It\'s Worth the Wait" from Joel on Podcast!  https://t.co/spV2a4pL3j https://t.co/8fV106jCIu'

b'If you can accomplish your dreams by yourself, then it doesn\xe2\x80\x99t take faith. Get this new encouraging message from Joel: https://t.co/spV2a4HmrT https://t.co/0Pyb2oDLFP'

b'God wouldn\xe2\x80\x99t have given you the dream if He didn\xe2\x80\x99t have a way to bring it to pass. He\xe2\x80\x99s not asking you to figure it out; He\xe2\x80\x99s asking you to believe. When you believe, God will make things happen that you couldn\xe2\x80\x99t make happen.'

b'Congratulations to @nikwallenda and @LijanaWallenda for completing an incredible tightrope walk across Times Square!  A true testament to their faith and determination to accomplish the dream God put in their hearts and to carry on their family\xe2\x80\x99s legacy.  #HighwireLIVE https://t.co/gaqkWbrvGQ'

b'Faith is not always going to make sense. What God promised you is not always going to be logical. There will be a battle taking place in your mind between what you see and what you hear.'

b'The scripture says, \xe2\x80\x9cThe things we see are temporary, but the things we can\xe2\x80\x99t see are eternal.\xe2\x80\x9d Watch Joel\xe2\x80\x99s message this morning on Podcast! "Your Wings Are Coming": https://t.co/KwNtaNHhCw https://t.co/Y860KAyeho'

b'You weren\xe2\x80\x99t created to go through life struggling, lonely, addicted. God didn\xe2\x80\x99t breathe life into you and crown you with favor, so you could barely get by. He created you to soar, to set new standards, to take new ground, to go further than you\xe2\x80\x99ve imagined.'
b'In difficult times, you\xe2\x80\x99re going to be saying something. Don\xe2\x80\x99t talk about how big your challenge is. Talk about how big your God is.'

b'God was thinking about you long before you got here. The Scripture says that God chose you before you could choose Him. You didn\xe2\x80\x99t get here on your own.'
